query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads) as total_leads,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM installers) as total_installers,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM email_tracking) as email_tracks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchase_activity) as purchase_activities
